exits.Water Temple Dark Link Region:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) and 
                ((Iron_Boots and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)) or keysanity) and can_use(Hookshot)

locations.Water Temple Cracked Wall Chest:
can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and has_explosives and
                    ((logic_water_cracked_wall_hovers and Hover_Boots) or can_reach(Water_Temple_Middle_Water_Level))
locations.Water Temple Torches Chest:
(has_bow or can_use(Dins_Fire) or 
                 as_child(can_reach(Water_Temple_Lobby) and has_sticks and Kokiri_Sword and Magic_Meter)) and 
                can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)
locations.Water Temple Dragon Chest:
Iron_Boots and can_use(Hookshot) and
                ((Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)) or 
                    ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or keysanity) and 
                        can_play(Song_of_Time) and has_bow))
locations.Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest:
has_bow and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and 
                can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and (Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot))
locations.Water Temple Boss Key Chest:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and 
                (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or keysanity) and 
                ((logic_water_bk_chest and Iron_Boots) or (has_explosives and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) or Hover_Boots) and 
                can_use(Longshot)
locations.GS Water Temple South Basement:
(can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots)) and 
                has_explosives and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)

exits.Water Temple Middle Water Level:
(has_bow or can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                 ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                 as_child(can_reach(Water_Temple_Lobby) and can_use(sticks))) and 
                can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)

locations.Water Temple Central Pillar Chest:
Iron_Boots and can_use(Zora_Tunic) and can_use(Hookshot) and 
                ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Dins_Fire))
locations.GS Water Temple Central Room:
((can_use(Longshot) or (can_use(Farores_Wind) and can_use(Hookshot))) and
                 ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Dins_Fire))) or
                as_child(can_reach(Water_Temple_Lobby) and
                         can_use(Boomerang) and can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                         (can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_use(Sticks)))

locations.Water Temple River Chest:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and can_play(Song_of_Time) and 
                has_bow and (can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) or keysanity)
